hsmod.declaration:
[Free Software] Distributed only on GitHub.
https://github.com/Pik-4/HsMod
isPluginEnable.name: HsMod Status
isPluginEnable.label: Global
isPluginEnable.description: Enable or disable the plugin (suggested to restart Hearthstone after changing this setting)
pluginLanague.name: HsMod Language
pluginLanague.label: Global
pluginLanague.description: Preferred language of the plugin (requires Hearthstone restart after change, and may invalidate old configuration; remember to back up HsMod.cfg)
configTemplate.name: Configuration Template
configTemplate.label: Global
configTemplate.description: Configuration run template; when set to DoNothing, no configuration changes are made. Automatically reverts to DoNothing after configuration change
isShortcutsEnable.name: Shortcut Status
isShortcutsEnable.label: Global
isTimeGearEnable.name: Speed Gear Status
isTimeGearEnable.label: Global
timeGear.name: Speed Multiplier
timeGear.label: Global
timeGear.description: Speed gear multiplier; 1 and 0 are the same rate, negative values slow down
isShowFPSEnable.name: Show FPS
isShowFPSEnable.label: Global
targetFrameRate.name: Game Frame Rate
targetFrameRate.label: Global
targetFrameRate.description: Game frame rate setting, -1 means no modification or restores default value (default may be 30)
isIGMMessageShow.name: In-Game Messages
isIGMMessageShow.label: Optimization
isIGMMessageShow.description: (If unable to open store, try enabling this) Show in-game messages (ads, nerf patches, ladder settlement info, etc.)
isAlertPopupShow.name: Popup Messages
isAlertPopupShow.label: Optimization
responseAlertPopup.name: Popup Response
responseAlertPopup.label: Optimization
responseAlertPopup.description: How to respond to popups when popup messages are blocked
isOnApplicationFocus.name: Application Focus
isOnApplicationFocus.label: Optimization
isRewardToastShow.name: Settlement Display
isRewardToastShow.label: Optimization
isRewardToastShow.description: Display task completions, achievement rewards, level-up hints, etc. (may cause lack of reward prompts)
isAutoOpenBoxesRewardEnable.name: Auto Open Boxes
isAutoOpenBoxesRewardEnable.label: Optimization
isAutoOpenBoxesRewardEnable.description: Auto-open chests from Arena (Duel, Mercenaries, etc.)
isAutoExit.name: Auto Exit on Error
isAutoExit.label: Optimization
isAutoRestart.name: Restart on Exit
isAutoRestart.label: Optimization
isAutoRestart.description: (May not work) Automatically restart on error
isShowCardLargeCount.name: Show Card Quantity
isShowCardLargeCount.label: Optimization
isShowCardLargeCount.description: Show quantity when the collection card count is greater than or equal to 10 (bug when selected)
isShowCollectionCardIdEnable.name: Show Card ID
isShowCollectionCardIdEnable.label: Optimization
isShowCollectionCardIdEnable.description: Show and copy CardID when right-click selecting a card (skin)
isBypassDeckShareCodeCheckEnable.name: Deck Share Code Check
isBypassDeckShareCodeCheckEnable.label: Optimization
isShowRetireForever.name: Show Concede
isShowRetireForever.label: Optimization
isIdleKickEnable.name: Allow Disconnect
isIdleKickEnable.label: Optimization
isIdleKickEnable.description: (Not yet tested) Allow disconnection after a long time without activity (configuration cannot load when starting game)
isQuickPackOpeningEnable.name: Quick Pack Opening
isQuickPackOpeningEnable.label: Pack Opening
isQuickPackOpeningEnable.description: Quickly show results when opening packs with space key
isAutoPackOpeningEnable.name: Auto Pack Opening
isAutoPackOpeningEnable.label: Pack Opening
isAutoPackOpeningEnable.description: (Use with caution, may have bugs!) Open all packs without distinguishing pack type (based on quick pack opening)
isAutoRefundCardDisenchantEnable.name: Auto Disenchant
isAutoRefundCardDisenchantEnable.label: Pack Opening
isAutoRefundCardDisenchantEnable.descrip: Auto-disenchant cards with full dust refund during pack opening (automatically disabled at startup, requires manual enabling)
isAutoReportEnable.name: Auto Report
isAutoReportEnable.label: Friends
isAutoReportEnable.description: Automatically report opponent for nickname violations, cheating, scripting, or malicious surrender after match ends
isMoveEnemyCardsEnable.name: Spectate Display Cards
isMoveEnemyCardsEnable.label: Friends
isMoveEnemyCardsEnable.description: (Not yet tested) Display (rotate) opponent's cards in Ob
isQuickModeEnable.name: Quick Battle
isQuickModeEnable.label: Hearthstone
isQuickModeEnable.description: Enable quick battle mode for Tavern or Mercenary AI
isFullnameShow.name: Show Full Name
isFullnameShow.label: Hearthstone
isFullnameShow.description: Display opponent's full Battle.net name; also allows adding current opponent (also allows adding opponent when starting shortcut)
isOpponentRankInGameShow.name: Show Ladder Rank
isOpponentRankInGameShow.label: Hearthstone
isOpponentRankInGameShow.description: Display opponent's ladder rank before Legend
isCardTrackerEnable.name: Card Tracker
isCardTrackerEnable.label: Hearthstone
isCardTrackerEnable.description: Predict opponent's cards and provide hints (e.g., choices; may incorrectly identify)
isCardRevealedEnable.name: Card Reveal
isCardRevealedEnable.label: Hearthstone
isCardRevealedEnable.description: Show known cards face up (may cause Hearthstone to auto-disconnect and reconnect)
isSkipHeroIntro.name: Skip Hero Intro
isSkipHeroIntro.label: Hearthstone
isExtendedBMEnable.name: Unlimited Emote
isExtendedBMEnable.label: Hearthstone
isThinkEmotesEnable.name: Thinking Emote
isThinkEmotesEnable.label: Hearthstone
receiveEnemyEmoteLimit.name: Emote Limit
receiveEnemyEmoteLimit.label: Hearthstone
receiveEnemyEmoteLimit.description: Limit on received in-game emotes; blocks opponent emotes if exceeded. Set to 0 to block at start, -1 for no limit (may have minor bugs)
isOpponentGoldenCardShow.name: Opponent Card Effects
isOpponentGoldenCardShow.label: Hearthstone
isOpponentGoldenCardShow.description: Display opponent's card effects (overrides ALL configuration)
isSignatureCardStateEnable.name: Signature Effects
isSignatureCardStateEnable.label: Hearthstone
isSignatureCardStateEnable.description: Display alternate artwork in highest card effects (only affects the highest card effects)
goldenCardState.name: Golden Card Effects
goldenCardState.label: Hearthstone
maxCardState.name: Highest Card Effects
maxCardState.label: Hearthstone
maxCardState.description: Force highest card effects (priority: diamond, alternate, golden, standard)
isAutoRecvMercenaryRewardEnable.name: Auto Collect Rewards
isAutoRecvMercenaryRewardEnable.label: Mercenary
isMercenaryBattleZoom.name: Allow Zoom
isMercenaryBattleZoom.label: Mercenary
isMercenaryBattleZoom.description: (May have bugs) Allow zooming during Mercenary battle
mercenaryDiamondCardState.name: Diamond Skin Replacement
mercenaryDiamondCardState.label: Mercenary
mercenaryDiamondCardState.description: Replace with diamond skin if possible (lower priority than Hearthstone - Highest Card Effects)
randomMercenarySkinEnable.name: Random Skin
randomMercenarySkinEnable.label: Mercenary
randomMercenarySkinEnable.description: Random skin (excludes diamond; Hearthstone - Diamond Card Effects must not be disabled)
isShutUpBobEnable.name: Silence Bob
isShutUpBobEnable.label: Tavern
isBgsGoldenEnable.name: Golden Tavern
isBgsGoldenEnable.label: Tavern
isBgsGoldenEnable.description: (Test; requires golden card effects enabled) Golden Tavern (does not apply to minions or questlines)
skinCoin.name: Coin
skinCoin.label: Skin
skinCoin.description: Preferred Coin ID, -1 means no modification (real-time update via in-game disconnect simulation)
skinCardBack.name: Card Back
skinCardBack.label: Skin
skinCardBack.description: Preferred Card Back ID, -1 means no modification (takes effect immediately)
skinBoard.name: Battle Board
skinBoard.label: Skin
skinBoard.description: (Experimental, may freeze in Tavern) Replace battle board, -1 means no modification
skinBgsBoard.name: Tavern Battle Board
skinBgsBoard.label: Skin
skinBgsBoard.description: Preferred Tavern Battle Board ID, -1 means no modification
skinBgsFinisher.name: Tavern Kill Effect
skinBgsFinisher.label: Skin
skinBgsFinisher.description: Preferred Tavern kill effect ID, -1 means no modification
skinBob.name: Bob
skinBob.label: Skin
skinBob.description: Preferred Bob ID, -1 means no modification
isSkinDefalutHeroEnable.name: Default Hero
isSkinDefalutHeroEnable.label: Skin
isSkinDefalutHeroEnable.description: Replace opponent hero skin with default skin if possible
skinHero.name: Hero
skinHero.label: Skin
skinHero.description: (Use with caution; not recommended for non-AFK. Lower priority than default hero. Typically, load hero skins from HsSkins.cfg, then press F4 to update. If in-game, also requires in-game disconnect simulation) Preferred hero ID, -1 means no modification
skinOpposingHero.name: Opponent Hero
skinOpposingHero.label: Skin
skinOpposingHero.description: (Use with caution; not recommended for non-AFK. Lower priority than default hero) Preferred opponent hero ID, -1 means no modification
keyTimeGearUp.name: Gear Multiplier +1
keyTimeGearUp.label: Shortcut
keyTimeGearUp.description: Increase gear multiplier by 1, default direction up
keyTimeGearDown.name: Gear Multiplier -1
keyTimeGearDown.label: Shortcut
keyTimeGearDown.description: Decrease gear multiplier by 1, default direction down
keyTimeGearDefault.name: Reset Gear Multiplier
keyTimeGearDefault.label: Shortcut
keyTimeGearDefault.description: Reset to default gear multiplier, default direction left
keyTimeGearMax.name: Max Gear Multiplier
keyTimeGearMax.label: Shortcut
keyTimeGearMax.description: Set to 4 if gear multiplier is less than 4, otherwise set to 8, default direction right
keySimulateDisconnect.name: Simulate Disconnect
keySimulateDisconnect.label: Shortcut
keySimulateDisconnect.description: Simulate disconnect and reconnect, note requires disabling error auto-exit and allowing popup messages, default Left Ctrl+D
keyCopyBattleTag.name: Copy Opponent BattleTag
keyCopyBattleTag.label: Shortcut
keyCopyBattleTag.description: Copy in-game opponent's Battle.net ID, default Left Ctrl+C
keyCopySelectBattleTag.name: Copy Selected Opponent BattleTag
keyCopySelectBattleTag.label: Shortcut
keyCopySelectBattleTag.description: Copy selected opponent's Battle.net ID in Tavern, default left mouse button
keyConcede.name: Concede
keyConcede.label: Shortcut
keyContinueMulligan.name: End Turn
keyContinueMulligan.label: Shortcut
keyContinueMulligan.description: End turn or confirm card replacement, default Space
keySquelch.name: Mute Opponent
keySquelch.label: Shortcut
keySquelch.description: Mute opponent's emotes, default Left Ctrl+Q
keySoundMute.name: Mute/Restore Volume
keySoundMute.label: Shortcut
keySoundMute.description: Mute or restore volume, default Left Ctrl+S
keyShutUpBob.name: Shut Up, Bob
keyShutUpBob.label: Shortcut
keyShutUpBob.description: Enable/Disable Bob's voice, default Left Ctrl+B
keyRefund.name: Full Disenchant
keyRefund.label: Shortcut
keyRefund.description: One-click full disenchant of cards (effective only on pack opening or collection screens and requires auto disenchant enabled), default Left Ctrl+Z
keyZeroDollarShopping.name: Zero-dollor Shopping
keyZeroDollarShopping.label: Shortcut
keyZeroDollarShopping.description: Zero-dollor Shopping, there is a risk of being banned, and you must enter the store to use it, default number key 0
keyRuin.name: Self-Destruct Now
keyRuin.label: Shortcut
keyReadNewCards.name: Mark as Read
keyReadNewCards.label: Shortcut
keyReadNewCards.description: Remove all 'New!' tags (effective only in pack opening and collection screens; in Mercenary mode (buggy, resets after restart), may require re-entering collection after use), default Left Ctrl+R
keyShowFPS.name: Show/Hide FPS
keyShowFPS.label: Shortcut
keyShowFPS.description: Show or hide FPS info, default Left Ctrl+P
keyEmoteGreetings.name: Greetings
keyEmoteGreetings.label: Shortcut
keyEmoteWellPlayed.name: Well Played
keyEmoteWellPlayed.label: Shortcut
keyEmoteWellPlayed.description: Well Played emote, default number key 2
keyEmoteThanks.name: Thanks
keyEmoteThanks.label: Shortcut
keyEmoteWow.name: Wow
keyEmoteWow.label: Shortcut
keyEmoteOops.name: Oops
keyEmoteOops.label: Shortcut
keyEmoteThreaten.name: Threaten
keyEmoteThreaten.label: Shortcut
hsLogPath.name: Hearthstone Log
hsLogPath.label: Development
hsLogPath.description: Path to Hearthstone process log file (relative to Hearthstone)
hsMatchLogPath.name: Match Log
hsMatchLogPath.label: Development
hsMatchLogPath.description: Path to Hearthstone match log file (relative to Hearthstone); priority given to command line parameters
autoQuitTimer.name: Auto Quit Timer
autoQuitTimer.label: Development
autoQuitTimer.description: Automatically quit after x seconds of gameplay (at the end of the match); x<=0 disables this option
isFakeOpenEnable.name: Simulate Pack Opening
isFakeOpenEnable.label: Development
isFakeOpenEnable.description: Enable simulated pack opening (suggested to restart Hearthstone after changing this option, enabling may lead to abnormal pack info stats)
buyAdventure.name: Buy Adventure
buyAdventure.label: Development
buyAdventure.description: (Buying Karazhan not recommended) Select an adventure to attempt purchase (risk of account ban, use discretion)
isKarazhanFixEnable.name: Karazhan Fix
isKarazhanFixEnable.label: Development
isKarazhanFixEnable.description: (Close after finishing, cannot play prologue) Fixes Karazhan Blackwing Rook; also usable to skip adventure stages (risk of account ban, use discretion)
webServerPort.name: Web Server Port
webServerPort.label: Development
webServerPort.description: WebServer port, priority given to command line parameters
webPageBackImg.name: Web Page Background Image
webPageBackImg.label: Development
isWebshellEnable.name: Webshell
isWebshellEnable.label: Development
isInternalModeEnable.name: Internal Mode
isInternalModeEnable.label: Development
isInternalModeEnable.description: Switch to internal mode (requires Hearthstone restart)
fakeDevicePreset.name: Device Simulation Template
fakeDevicePreset.label: Simulation
fakeDevicePreset.description: (Takes effect after Hearthstone restart) Simulate device for card pack and card back collection
fakeDeviceOs.name: Simulated Device OS
fakeDeviceOs.label: Simulation
fakeDeviceOs.description: Simulated device OS, effective when device simulation template is set to Custom
fakeDeviceScreen.name: Device Screen Size
fakeDeviceScreen.label: Simulation
fakeDeviceScreen.description: Simulated size (screen type), effective when device simulation template is set to Custom
fakeDeviceName.name: Device Model
fakeDeviceName.label: Simulation
fakeDeviceName.description: Simulated device model, effective when device simulation template is set to Custom
fakePackCount.name: Count
fakePackCount.label: Simulation
fakeBoosterDbId.name: Type
fakeBoosterDbId.label: Simulation
fakeBoosterDbId.description: Simulated card pack type (replaces card pack icon)
isFakeRandomResult.name: Random Result
isFakeRandomResult.label: Simulation
isFakeRandomRarity.name: Random Rarity
isFakeRandomRarity.label: Simulation
isFakeRandomPremium.name: Random Quality
isFakeRandomPremium.label: Simulation
isFakeAtypicalRandomPremium.name: Random Additional Effects
isFakeAtypicalRandomPremium.label: Simulation
isFakeAtypicalRandomPremium.description: Include diamond or alternate art in random quality (based on random quality)
fakeRandomRarity.name: Rarity Type
fakeRandomRarity.label: Simulation
fakeRandomRarity.description: Specify random rarity (based on random rarity)
fakeRandomPremium.name: Quality Type
fakeRandomPremium.label: Simulation
fakeCatchupCount.name: Catchup card num
fakeCatchupCount.label: Simulation
fakeCatchupCount.description: Catchup Card Count, random if less than 5
fakeCardID1.name: Card 1
fakeCardID1.label: Simulation
fakeCardPremium1.name: Card 1 Quality
fakeCardPremium1.label: Simulation
fakeCardID2.name: Card 2
fakeCardID2.label: Simulation
fakeCardPremium2.name: Card 2 Quality
fakeCardPremium2.label: Simulation
fakeCardID3.name: Card 3
fakeCardID3.label: Simulation
fakeCardPremium3.name: Card 3 Quality
fakeCardPremium3.label: Simulation
fakeCardID4.name: Card 4
fakeCardID4.label: Simulation
fakeCardPremium4.name: Card 4 Quality
fakeCardPremium4.label: Simulation
fakeCardID5.name: Card 5
fakeCardID5.label: Simulation
fakeCardPremium5.name: Card 5 Quality
fakeCardPremium5.label: Simulation
HsSkins.cfg:
# Skin mapping table
# Description: Mainly used for hero (tavern, battle) skin replacement; Press F4 to generate all current skin information in the BepInEx directory;
# Format: original skin: replacement skin (: is a half-width character); the next line is an example (Malfurion Stormrage is replaced by Grandmaster Malfurion), which can be deleted
#     It also supports multi-value mapping such as a:b,c,d to achieve random skin.
274:57761
isAutoRedundantNDE.name: Auto Replace Cards
isAutoRedundantNDE.label: Optimization
isAutoRedundantNDE.description: Disable the card replacement window and automatically replace cards
